examples: I don't know where I left my keys. They could be anywhere .
For many 'home' is an affectation when used anywhere that 'house' would be appropriate, as in 'Home for Sale'.

definitions.definition: To ( in the direction of ) any location.
examples: Anywhere you go in France, there will be bread and wine with dinner.
I'm staying home today. I'm not going anywhere .
Are you going anywhere special this weekend?

secondary_definitions: To ( in the direction of ) any location.
